CustomField.description: Shows how much credit the customer still has available.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Consumed_Credit_Limit__c) || ISNULL(Consumed_Credit_Limit__c), Credit_Limit__c, Credit_Limit__c - Consumed_Credit_Limit__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows how much credit the customer still has available.
CustomField.label: Available Credit Limit
